actr.task

Class TaskLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • actr.task.TaskLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class TaskLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements TaskComponent
    The class that defines a label for a task interface.
    Author:
    Dario Salvucci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
